- **SAML (Security Assertion Markup Language)** is an XML-based standard for exchanging authentication and authorization data between parties.  
- It enables **Single Sign-On (SSO)** by allowing an Identity Provider (IdP) to authenticate users and pass assertions to a Service Provider (SP).  
- It improves security by **centralizing authentication** and avoiding direct password sharing with applications.
Explain SAML in three bullets. reply in serbian latin

- **SAML (Security Assertion Markup Language)** je standard za bezbednu razmenu podataka o autentifikaciji i autorizaciji između sistema.  
- Omogućava **Single Sign-On (SSO)** – korisnik se jednom prijavi i pristupa više aplikacija bez ponovnog logovanja.  
- Zasniva se na **XML porukama** koje razmenjuju Identity Provider (IdP) i Service Provider (SP).
